content.title: Rename Network Zone in PAN-OS (v11.0+)
content.summary: Renames an existing network zone within a specified configuration scope, such as 'vsys'. This operation changes only the zone name and does not alter other zone attributes. It uses the :rename action and does not require a request body.

required_query_parameters.location: Defines the configuration scope, such as 'vsys' or 'shared'.
required_query_parameters.vsys: Required if location is 'vsys'. Example: vsys1.
required_query_parameters.name: The current name of the zone.
required_query_parameters.newname: The new name to assign to the zone.

common_errors: 400: Missing or invalid query parameters (location, vsys, name, or newname)
404: Zone not found in the specified scope
409: A zone with the new name already exists
